Create a new collaboration space owned by the client the user is authenticated for.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"The model of the space to create.","required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"CollaborationSpaceCreate","type":"object","description":"Create Collaboration Space","x-ogen-name":"CollaborationSpaceCreate","allOf":[{"type":"object","title":"CollaborationSpaceUpdate","description":"Update Collaboration Space","x-ogen-name":"CollaborationSpaceUpdate","properties":{"name":{"type":"string"},"category":{"type":"string"},"description":{"type":"string","description":"A short description of the purpose of the space."}}},{"required":["name"]}]}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
